item.title: Federal judge blocks Kroger-Albertsons merger, says it would ‘remove competition’
item.description: A federal judge has blocked supermarket chain Kroger Co.’s merger with rival Albertsons Cos., saying it would stifle competition in the grocery indust...

item.title: GameStop’s stock jumps on surprise third-quarter profit
item.description: Shares of GameStop Corp. were up 8.2% in extended trading after the videogame retailer reported a surprise third-quarter profit, despite falling sales...

item.title: I’m 42 and married with no kids. I have $114K in a 401(k) and $1,400 in credit-card debt. How can I grow my wealth?
item.description: “I am not that familiar with investing, but currently educating myself about it.”

item.title: I’m a 59-year-old recluse with PTSD, a cancer diagnosis and no living relatives. What should I do with my $900,000 life savings?
item.description: “I have a large bank as trustee, and it will take a large chunk to distribute my estate.”

item.title: ‘She is single and has a low-wage job’: I want to give my daughter, who is in her 30s, $50,000 for retirement. What could go wrong?
item.description: “She can invest aggressively, as she has over two decades to see her principal grow.”
